item.title: Containers & Docker Images
item.description: Containers are getting more popular year by year and more companies are adopting containers as their default development environment. One of the primary reasons for the rapid adoption are the flexibility to package the application code, share it and running anywhere regardless of the operating system host. Another reason is the mass adoption of Microservices Architectures. A Hello World container The busybox images contain the basic UNIX tools like echo, ls and so on.
